Text: I have been waiting for Slash for so long!!! A huge bonus is the Toni Iommi book. I am stoked so about that book!! Thank you so much :)

#chinook92. Still hunting around. I just posted an autobiography on Clapton--don't know if that's your taste or not. I still have at least a few more to go, so hopefully you will like at least some of them.
We have the same taste in music! Thank you very much :)
